In environment plus_cancel_l' := plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c k, n : nat f : nat -> nat H1 : k <> 0 H2 : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k Unable to unify "1 <= S ?M1445" with "S (S (∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k))) <= power n k".

In environment H : forall n : nat, 0 < S n k, n : nat f : nat -> nat H1 : k = 0 -> False H2 : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k Unable to unify "S (f ?M1585) <= k" with "S (S (∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k))) <= power n k".

original: intros H1 H2. apply (@sum_0n_mono n (fun i => f i * power i k) (fun _ => power i k)). intros i Hi. apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply Nat.mul_lt_mono_pos_r with (p := f i). -- apply lt_0_Sn. -- apply H2. auto. apply sum_0n_scal_r. rewrite Nat.mul_1_l. apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply H2. apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply Nat.lt_0_succ. apply plus_cancel_l'. intros p q H. specialize (H2 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ n)). simpl in H2. rewrite H2 in H. rewrite H. auto.
